name: throw some dual kamas builds my way plz
author: Concavenator

posts.author: Concavenator
posts.content:
saw a zombie lord using dual kamas... looks cool so now i want to make one too.
im playing the main campaign, and sometime pvp with friends.
read some ranger/monk/sd and fighter/monk/wm builds, since i dont really use stealth much should i just go with the fighter ones? are there other class combo im not seeing?
there is no way to use dex for dmg for melee in this game right?

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
There are loads of other options! One that springs to mind is Monk 25/ Sorcerer 1/ RDD 14, but that's one of Empyre's Order of the Wyrm specialities, so I'll leave it to him to expand further (I really like it).

No, dex won't add to your damage, sorry. Sneak attacks will improve your damage, though. If you take the Weapon Finesse feat, it will improve your chance of hitting an enemy, but it requires more of a woodpecker approach rather than a lumberjack.

Cheers

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
Here is the one that Stag mentioned, Order of the Wyrm:

I have played and enjoyed (earlier versions of) both of these.

In Dervish, you might consider another feat at level 40 instead of Opportunist, like Improved Sneak Attack or Slippery Mind.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
The Kukri master wants to have two words with that zombie lord, if possible, please...

(Yeah, I know he is undead & Dev Crit from 7 attacks/round with 10-20 Crit Range won't matter in this case, but for anyone else...Oh boy!!)


Link to the Kukri master (updated) => kukri-master-fighter-8-weapon-master-22 ... tml#p16534
It comes with different flavours too => dual-kukri-master-fighter-12-wm-25-rogu ... tml#p17266
